short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best tool with maximum number of configuration options for compressing or minifying your CSS online. Make your site load faster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSS Compressor and Minifier is the best tool for compressing or minifying your CSS files online. It gives you the maximum number of configuration options for compressing your CSS files.

Our tool has been designed considering all browsers till date(including IE5 and below) as well as all upcoming browsers in future. It also takes care of the 'Box Model Hack', thanks to YUI Compressor.

Make your site load faster by optimizing your CSS!
